title: Vendor security compliance review
description: CISO review of SOC 2 and security posture for all three observability vendors.
notes: Complete. DataSentry: SOC 2 Type II. Grafana: NO SOC 2. ObsAI: SOC 2 Type I only.

title: Engineering team vendor preference poll

title: Vendor TCO analysis
description: Calculate total cost of ownership for each vendor including hidden costs, setup, support, and engineering effort.
notes: Need to factor in Grafana's hidden setup ($30K) and support ($12K/yr) costs. Also engineering effort for custom alerting.
